title: crab with saffron aioli and seasonal salad
description: Soft-shell crabs are surprisingly easy to cook at home because almost all the crab can be eaten saving lots of preparation time.
ingredients: 6 garlic cloves, peeled and left whole
½ tsp saffron, soaked in 25ml/1fl oz hot water
2 heads Little Gem lettuce, leaves separated
2 spring onions, finely chopped, to garnish
